title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Aug 15 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show
Thursday, 15 August 2013


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site :: On the Thursday, August 15 edition of The Alex Jones Show. Alex responds to the premeditated, staggering attacks against his character. Facing the reality of a declining viewership, the mainstream, mockingbird media is resorting to outright lies and slander as the public begins to turn away and think for themselves. 

The Department of Homeland Security is trying to build a domestic army by giving local authorities armored tanks and heavy firepower in order to "deal with the threat" posed by the non-violent American public. Cities are already placing surveillance cameras and microphones above street corners across America. 

Well-known author and lecturer Red Beckman joins to show to showcase the tyranny of the IRS.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
